item.description:
FREE ADVANCED SCREENING & DIRECTOR Q&A



**THE SIGNAL**


"Do you have the crazy?"



** There will be a brief question and answer session with the film's directors, DAVID BRUCKNER, DAN BUSH and JACOB GENTRY following this special advanced screening. **


View The Signal Trailer

<object width="425" height="355"><embed src="http://www.youtube.co... type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="355" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></embed></object>

Please print out the pass located in the group's file for admission, each pass admits two - feel free to print as many as you need. Just as an FYI: seating is not guaranteed and is available on a first come first served basis, so arrive early!

Email advanced.screening@gmail.com with "THE SIGNAL" as the subject line if you have any further questions.

Synopsis: It's New Year's Eve in the city of Terminus and chaos is this year's resolution. All forms of communication have been jammed by an enigmatic transmission that preys on fear and desire driving everyone in the city to murder and madness. In a place once marked by conformity but now sent into complete anarchy, the rebellious Ben must save the woman he loves fro the bedlam in the streets as well as her crazed sadistic husband. But the only way he can tell who to trust or who has given in to violence is by uncovering the true nature of The Signal.


Told in three parts from three unique perspectives by three visionary directors, THE SIGNAL was originally conceived as an experimental film project called Exquisite Corpse where one filmmaker would begin a story then hand it off to another filmmaker to continue and then to another and so on until the movie was complete. The story eventually took shape and evolved into a sci-fi/horror/thriller that imagines a world where everyday anxieties became the catalyst for inhuman terror. The Signal is a horrific journey towards discovering that the most brutal monster might actually be within all of us.




Opening in theaters: February 22, 2008

[edit by JediFonger]
http://files.meetup.c...
^free moviepass.

show up@6PM and prior to get seats. 10x sarah!
[end edit]
